10000.name: Understanding & Working with Git
10000.description: Learn what Git is and how developers use it to manage source code in a highly distributed manner.

10010.name: Understanding & Working with GitHub
10010.description: Learn the value of GitHub and how it is used not only to manage your team's source code, but also how it can help improve project management.

10020.name: Advanced Git
10020.description: Learn the workflows and techniques senior webdevs use to be more productive with Git and to solve everyday source code management problems.

10030.name: Building Webpages
10030.description: Learn how to build simple webpages using HTML and CSS

10040.name: Beginning Javascript
10040.description: Learn the basics of the Javascript language

10050.name: Intermediate Javascript
10050.description: Gain insight into how Javascript handles datatypes and objects

10060.name: Advanced Javascript
10060.description: Acquire and indepth understanding of asynchronous operations and modern ES6 Javascript

10070.name: P1XT Guide: Prerequisites
10070.description: Prerequisite knowledge you will need before starting the courses that make up the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

10080.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 1 - Getting Started
10080.description: Prerequisite knowledge you will need before starting the courses that make up the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

10090.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 2 - Develop More Expertise
10090.description: Establish a solid foundational understanding of Javascript, HTML, and CSS

10100.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 3 - Add More Rigor
10100.description: Increase your knowledge by learning functional programming and webdev technologies and techniques.

10110.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 4 - Polish the Rough Edges
10110.description: Round out your knowledge by increasing your knowledge of advanced subjects like Artificial Intelligence, and put your knowledge to the test by completing advanced projects.

10200.name: HTML Basics
10200.description: Learn the basics of HTML - the standard used to define webpages

10210.name: CSS Basics
10210.description: Learn the basics of CSS - the standard used to style webpages

10220.name: Marrying HTML & CSS
10220.description: Learn how to combine HTML and CSS to create a professional webpage

10230.name: Intermediate HTML
10230.description: Improve your HTML knowledge with additional HTML programming techniques

10240.name: Intermediate CSS
10240.description: Improve your CSS knowledge with additional CSS programming techniques

10250.name: Advanced HTML & CSS
10250.description: Polish your HTML and CSS knowledge and skills with advanced techniques

10270.name: Introduction to Bootstrap
10270.description: Learn how to use the Bootstrap Library for styling

10280.name: Introduction to Foundation
10280.description: Learn how to use the Foundation Library for styling

10290.name: Introduction to Sass
10290.description: Learn how to use the Sass Library for styling

10300.name: Introduction to Less
10300.description: Learn how to use the Less Library for styling

10310.name: Introduction to Stylus
10310.description: Learn how to use the Stylus Library for styling
